I suppose that libsigcomp is under *C:\*

= Microsoft Visual Studio =
Under _C:\libsigcomp_ directory you have *SigComp.sln* which contains both _demo.vcproj_ and _libsigcomp.vcproj_ projects.<br>
Using *Configuration Manager* (Visual Studio Toolbar) combobox choose your target platform.

== Cygwin and CeGCC==
To compile *libSigComp* for WinCE/Windows Mobile you have to install a cross compiler for Windows CE. I highly recommend [http://cegcc.sourceforge.net/ CeGCC].
